LanguageData.MechanoidTeleport_Generator.label: Mechanoid portal generator
LanguageData.MechanoidTeleport_Generator.description: It seems that whatever is powering the portal is inside.
LanguageData.MechanoidTeleport.label: Mechanoid portal
LanguageData.MechanoidTeleport.description: A hole in space generated by the strange machine. Allows mechanoids on the other side to travel to your colony instantly.
LanguageData.HiveCrack.label: Hive crack
LanguageData.HiveCrack.description: A tunnel leading to an underground hive of cave spiders. Nobody is willing to go down it, perhaps if you shoot it enough (from a nice not-near-giant-spiders distance) it may collapse on itself.
LanguageData.OpenableContainer.label: Container
LanguageData.ClimatBomb.label: Climate bomb
LanguageData.ClimatBomb.description: A massive device with an unknown artifact in the center. Generates a large amount of energy to be injected into the atmosphere. This will make the regional climate very unstable and unpredictable.
